intro: Adorium hookeri, commonly known as the Hooker's adorium, is a rare and endangered plant species native to the mountainous regions of New Zealand. Due to habitat loss and climate change, Adorium hookeri is critically threatened, prompting efforts to protect and study its ecological role.
